identity.name: myridius EVOQ
identity.description: A high-performance commercial lending workbench that blends human expertise with AI efficiency.

usage.headings: Manrope, font-bold or font-extrabold, tracking-tight. Use for page titles and section headers.
usage.body: IBM Plex Sans, font-normal. Use for table data, chat text, and general content.
usage.labels: IBM Plex Sans, font-medium, uppercase, tracking-wider, text-xs. Use for column headers and small tags.
usage.numbers: IBM Plex Sans, tabular-nums. CRITICAL for financial data alignment.

layout.structure: Fixed left sidebar (w-64) + scrollable main content area.

table.style: Clean, row-based. No vertical borders. Light horizontal borders.
table.header: Sticky top, bg-gray-50/90 backdrop-blur, text-xs uppercase text-gray-500 font-medium.
table.row: Hover: bg-gray-50 transition-colors. Cursor-pointer for expandable rows.
table.expand_animation: Use Framer Motion AnimatePresence and layout props for smooth height transition.
table.badges: Pill-shaped, px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full.

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm overflow-hidden

chat.container: flex flex-col h-full bg-white border-r border-gray-200

bubbles.ai: bg-gray-100 text-gray-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-none p-4 max-w-[85%]
bubbles.user: bg-[#55C9A6] text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-none p-4 max-w-[85%] self-end

chat.input: sticky bottom-0 bg-white p-4 border-t border-gray-100

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors for professional look.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture on sidebar background (optional).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Workbench' as the landing page.
Use 'recharts' for all charts (Radar for Porter's 5 Forces, ComposedChart for Financials).
Ensure the expandable row uses Framer Motion for a smooth 'accordion' feel.
The sidebar navigation must be persistent.
Strictly follow the color palette. Do not use default Tailwind blue.
Mock data should be realistic commercial lending data (Tesla, Acme Corp, etc.).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards.
